in.ac.iitk.cse.putwb.partition

Class PartitionPlan

  • java.lang.Object
    • in.ac.iitk.cse.putwb.partition.PartitionPlan

  • public class PartitionPlan
extends Object
    Represents a plan for distributing attributes among learning pods.
    Author:
    Saurabh Srivastava

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PartitionPlan(int numOfAttributes, int partitionSize, float expense)
      Initiates a new partition plan for the given number of attributes, partition size and expense weight

    • Constructor Detail

      • PartitionPlan

        public PartitionPlan(int numOfAttributes,
                     int partitionSize,
                     float expense)
        Initiates a new partition plan for the given number of attributes, partition size and expense weight
        Parameters:
        numOfAttributes - The number of attributes in the dataset
        partitionSize - The size of partitions to create
        expense - An expense weight to consider while creating a plan

    • Method Detail

      • addPrivacyException

        public void addPrivacyException(int... attributes)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a privacy exception for a set of attributes. All attributes must be in the range [0, number of attributes)
        Parameters:
        attributes - A list of attributes
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the attributes are not in range or the number of attributes are more than the partition size

      • addUtilityException

        public void addUtilityException(int... attributes)
                         throws IllegalArgumentException
        Adds a utility exception for a set of attributes. All attributes must be in the range [0, number of attributes)
        NOTE: If a utility exception conflicts with a privacy exception, the privacy exception takes precedence
        Parameters:
        attributes - A list of attributes
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if any of the attributes are not in range or the number of attributes are more than the partition size

                 throws IllegalArgumentException
        Returns the expense weight for this partition plan

        the expense weight
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException

        public Set<Set<Integer>> getPrivacyExceptionsSet()

        the utility exceptions

      • getUtilityExceptionsSet

        public Set<Set<Integer>> getUtilityExceptionsSet()
        Returns the utility exceptions set for this partition plan
        NOTE: If any utility exceptions conflict with privacy exceptions, the privacy exceptions take precedence
        Returns:
        the exception map

      • isGenerateRandomly

        public boolean isGenerateRandomly()
        Returns whether the combinations should be generated randomly (or in dictionary order). By default, returns true.
        Returns:
        the generateRandomly true if combinations are to be generated randomly, false otherwise

      • setExpense

        public void setExpense(float expense)
                throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the expense weight for this partition plan. Must be in the range (0,1]
        Parameters:
        expense - the expense to set
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number is not in the range (0,1]

      • setGenerateRandomly

        public void setGenerateRandomly(boolean generateRandomly)
        Sets whether combinations should be generated randomly (or in dictionary order)
        Parameters:
        generateRandomly - true means generate combinations randomly, false means combinations shall be generated in dictionary order

      • setNumOfAttributes

        public void setNumOfAttributes(int numOfAttributes)
                        throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the number of attributes in this partition plan
        Parameters:
        numOfAttributes - the numOfAttributes to set
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the number of attributes are 0 or less

      • setPartitionSize

        public void setPartitionSize(int partitionSize)
                      throws IllegalArgumentException
        Sets the size of a single partition for this partition plan. It must be in the range [1, number of attributes]
        Parameters:
        partitionSize - the partition size to set
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the partition size is out of the range [1, number of attributes]

      • setPrivacyExceptions

        public void setPrivacyExceptions(Set<Set<Integer>> privacyExceptions)
        Sets the set of privacy exceptions to honour
        Parameters:
        privacyExceptions - The set of privacy exceptions

        Sets the set of utility exceptions to honour
        Parameters:
        utilityExceptions - The set of utility exceptions
